title: Calories in Hash Brown Potatoes
meta_description: Learn calories in hash brown potatoes per 100g serving, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition facts for easy meal planning.
assumptions: Home-prepared from fresh potatoes, pan-fried in vegetable oil, shredded, no added salt or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by preparation method, oil type/amount, potato variety, and added ingredients. Check labels for commercial products.

quick_answer.text: 100g of pan-fried hash brown potatoes provide ~252 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g hash brown potatoes?
faqs.a: Approximately 252 kcal for pan-fried hash browns.

faqs.q: Are hash brown potatoes high in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, about 31.5g carbs per 100g, mainly from potatoes.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in hash brown potatoes?
faqs.a: Around 13.4g total fat per 100g, from frying oil.

faqs.q: Do hash brown potatoes have protein?
How to reduce calories in hash brown potatoes?
faqs.a: Bake instead of frying or use minimal oil to cut fat and calories.
